Class AdminService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.AdminService
@Service public class AdminService extends Object
Service class responsible for administrative operations.

Provides functionalities such as approving or rejecting instructor applications and blocking users. Interacts with InstructorAppService and UserService to perform these operations.

See Also:

  • UserService

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminService

      public AdminService()

  • Method Details

    • approveInstructorApp

      public void approveInstructorApp(UUID applicationId)
      Approves an instructor application.

      Changes the status of the specified instructor application to ApplicationStatus.APPROVED, promotes the applicant to an instructor, and updates the application timestamp.

      Parameters:
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the instructor application to approve
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the application is already approved

    • rejectInstructorApp

      public void rejectInstructorApp(UUID applicationId, String reason)
      Rejects an instructor application.

      Changes the status of the specified instructor application to ApplicationStatus.REJECTED, records the reason for rejection, and updates the application timestamp.

      Parameters:
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the instructor application to reject
      reason - the reason for rejecting the application
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the application is already rejected

    • blockUser

      public void blockUser(@NonNull User admin, @NonNull String userId)
      Blocks a user from accessing the platform.

      Verifies that the requesting user is an admin, ensures the target user is not an admin, and proceeds to block the specified user.

      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin performing the block operation
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to block
      Throws:
      UserIsNotAdminException - if the requesting user is not an admin
      AdminCantBeBlockedException - if an attempt is made to block another admin
